parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of instance.

>  You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~86911~~) operation to query details of all AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances in a specific region, including instance IDs.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mmZ* format. The time must be in UTC.

>  The end time must be later than the start time. The interval cannot be more than 24 hours.

parameters.name: ExecuteCost
parameters.description: The execution duration of the SQL statement. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: ExecuteState
parameters.description:
The execution status of the SQL statement. Valid values:

*   **1**: successful.
*   **0**: failed.

parameters.name: MaxExecuteCost
parameters.description: The maximum amount of time consumed by a slow query. Minimum value: 0. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: MinExecuteCost
parameters.description: The minimum amount of time consumed by a slow query. Minimum value: 0. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: OperationClass
parameters.description:
The type of the query language. Valid values:

*   **DQL**
*   **DML**
*   **DDL**
*   **DCL**
*   **TCL**

parameters.name: OperationType
parameters.description:
The type of the SQL statement.

> *   If the **OperationClass** parameter is specified, the **OperationType** value must belong to the corresponding query language. For example, if the **OperationClass** value is **DQL**, the **OperationType** value must be a **DQL** SQL statement such as **SELECT**.
>*   If the **OperationClass** parameter is not specified, the **OperationType** value can be an SQL statement of all query languages.
>*   If neither of the **OperationClass** and **OperationType** parameters is specified, all types of SQL statements are returned.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. The maximum value is 200.

parameters.name: QueryKeywords
parameters.description: The keywords of the SQL statement.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the instance.

> You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~86912~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the instance belongs.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mmZ* format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: User
parameters.description: The name of the database account.
